# PHPickerConfiguration.Update

**Structure**

An object that defines the aspects of a photo picker’s appearance that can change while it’s presented.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Update
```

## Overview

While a photos picker is visible, you can use an instance of this structure to change its [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct/edgesWithoutContentMargins] or [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct/selectionLimit] properties. To do that, create and configure an instance of this object and pass it to the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerViewController] method [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerViewController/updatePicker(using:)].

## Creating an update object

- **init()**

## Adjusting selection limits

- **selectionLimit**: The maximum number of selections the user can make.

## Adjusting content margins

- **edgesWithoutContentMargins**: The portions of a photo picker’s permiter that are borderless.

## Customizing picker appearance and behavior

- **mode**: A layout type for the photos in the picker’s view.
- **PHPickerMode**: Layout options that determine how the picker orders photos visually.
- **disabledCapabilities**: The aspects of a photo picker’s default appearance that your app can disable.
- **PHPickerCapabilities**: Options that customize the look and behavior of the photos picker.
- **edgesWithoutContentMargins**: The portions of a photo picker’s perimeter that are borderless.

## Conforms To
